---
title: "Scatter Plot with Logistic Regression"
author: "Haley Uyeunten"
date: '2022-05-30'
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
biopsy <- read_csv("biopsy14.csv")

biopsy <- biopsy %>%
  mutate(class = as.factor(class))
```

```{r}
ggplot(biopsy, aes(x = V4, y = as.numeric(class) - 1)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_jitter(height = 0.03) +
  geom_smooth(method = "glm", method.args = list(family = "binomial"), se = FALSE, formula = y ~ x) +
  labs(x = "Marginal Adhesion (V4)", y = "Class (0 = benign, 1 = malignant)")
```
